name: Schere Stein Papier
overview: Rock Paper Scissors and Tetris had a baby! Rocks, Paper and Scissors drop from the top. You want to put scissors on top of paper, paper on top of rock and rock on top of scissors to remove them both from the playing field. Published in the following: • Magic Disk 64 1992/10 • Magic Disk 64 GE 1993/1.
